summary: Completed frontend testing for new Postnatal section in NICU. All 9 test cases PASSED. The Postnatal widget appears on NICU dashboard without 'Coming Soon' badge, navigation works correctly, search functionality filters topics, and all 3 topic contents (Routine Newborn Management, Assessment of Newborn, Hemoglobinopathy Screening) display correctly with comprehensive medical content.
passed_tests: Postnatal widget appears on NICU dashboard (no 'Coming Soon' badge)
Clicking Postnatal widget navigates to Postnatal page
Postnatal page has search bar that filters topics
Postnatal page has topic dropdown selector with 3 options: 'Routine Newborn Management', 'Assessment of Newborn', 'Hemoglobinopathy Screening'
'Routine Newborn Management' topic displays content about delivery room care, Apgar score, vitamin K, transitional period, feeding, discharge criteria

'Assessment of Newborn' topic displays comprehensive physical examination guide content (General Appearance, Vital Signs, Measurements, Head Examination, Eyes, Cardiovascular, Respiratory, Neurological, Primitive Reflexes)
'Hemoglobinopathy Screening' topic displays content about newborn screening results (FS, FSA, FAS patterns)
Search functionality filters topics (searching 'sickle' shows Hemoglobinopathy Screening)
Back button navigates back to NICU dashboard
critical_code_review_comments: PostnatalPage.jsx: Well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Topic selector uses shadcn Select component with proper accessibility
Search functionality correctly filters by label and keywords array
All 3 approach components (RoutineManagementApproach, NewbornAssessmentApproach, HemoglobinopathyApproach) have proper data-testid attributes
Content is comprehensive and follows medical guidelines (UpToDate/AAP/WHO)
UI design matches existing NICUApproachesPage pattern as requested
context_for_next_testing_agent: Postnatal section fully tested and working. Navigation: Login > Dashboard > NICU > Postnatal widget. Features: 1) Search bar filters topics by label and keywords, 2) Dropdown selector with 3 topics (alphabetically sorted), 3) Each topic displays comprehensive medical content. All data-testid attributes present: postnatal-page, postnatal-search, postnatal-topic-selector, postnatal-tab-{id}, routine-management-approach, newborn-assessment-approach, hemoglobinopathy-approach. Back button returns to NICU dashboard.
